text: @BernieSanders Go back 2 bed Bernie. I've been reading many things from Drs.& others that the Covid19 isn't near the threat they once thought it 2B in the beginning. The deaths that occurred aren't nearly as many as they had said. Covid19 is secondary 2 the other health problems that most had.
